# Autogenerated file, run tools/build/setup_cmake.py to regenerate

include_directories(${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_INCLUDE_PATH})
link_directories(${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_LINK_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LINK_PATH})

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${BASE_CXX_FLAGS}")

math(EXPR timeout "${IMP_TIMEOUT_FACTOR} * 300")

set(cppbenchmarks )

foreach (bin ${cppbenchmarks})
   GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${bin} NAME_WE)
   add_executable(base.${name} ${bin})
   target_link_libraries(base.${name}     imp_base
    
    ${IMP_BENCHMARK_LIBRARY}
    ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES}
${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES})
   set_target_properties(base.${name} PROPERTIES
                         RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/benchmark/base"
                         OUTPUT_NAME ${name})
   add_test(base.${name} ${IMP_TEST_SETUP}
            "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/benchmark/base/${name}${CMAKE_EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX}")
   set_tests_properties("base.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.base;benchmark")
   set_tests_properties("base.${name}" PROPERTIES TIMEOUT ${timeout})
   set_tests_properties("base.${name}" PROPERTIES COST 1)
   set(executables ${executables} base.${name})
endforeach(bin)

add_custom_target("imp_base_benchmarks" ALL DEPENDS ${executables}
  # add dummy dep as empty targets seem to go away
  imp_base imp_base)

set(pybenchmarks )
foreach (test ${pybenchmarks})
 GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME_WE)
 add_test("base.${name}" ${IMP_TEST_SETUP} python ${test})
 set_tests_properties("base.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.base;benchmark")
 set_tests_properties("base.${name}" PROPERTIES TIMEOUT ${timeout})
 set_tests_properties("base.${name}" PROPERTIES COST 4)
endforeach(test)
